question.title: Promise Pool
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Sleep", "titleSlug": "sleep", "difficulty": "Easy", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Promise Time Limit", "titleSlug": "promise-time-limit", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Cache With Time Limit", "titleSlug": "cache-with-time-limit", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Throttle", "titleSlug": "throttle", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: Initially execute all the functions until the queue fills up.
Every time a function resolves, add a new promise to the queue if possible.
question.sampleTestCase:
[() => new Promise(res => setTimeout(res, 300)), () => new Promise(res => setTimeout(res, 400)), () => new Promise(res => setTimeout(res, 200))]
2
